name: Roronoa Zoro
text:
If your opponent has 2 or more characters on the field, this character can attack characters on the turn it is played.
[On Play] If your leader has the type {Strawhat Crew}, rest up to one of your opponent's characters with a cost of 4 or less.

effect.text: If your opponent has 2 or more characters on the field, this character can attack characters on the turn it is played.
If your leader has the type {Strawhat Crew}, rest up to one of your opponent's characters with a cost of 4 or less.
